attributes.action: Keep Saver Return tickets on our rail network
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Independent newspaper last week reported that the Government was thinking about removing Saver Return tickets from the UK Rail Network. This would not only affect me, but millions of other rail users, as the cheapest ticket would dissapear, and make our already expensive network, even more costly to use. Sign this to show your dissaproval to this idea.
